alias.description: User-defined identifier of this dataset version.

availability.description: Availability of the data for this model version.

contributions.description: List of contributions that were involved in the creation/publication of this version of the dataset.

digitalIdentifier.description: Unique digital identifier for the dataset version.

documentation.description: Documentation related to the dataset version.

isNewVersionOf.description: Link to previous model version to which this version is an update to.

isSupplementTo.description: Link to other model versions to which this version is a supplement to.

isVariantFormOf.description: Link to other model versions to which this version is an alternative to/another variant of.

homepage.description: The uniform resource identifier (URI) to the homepage of the model version.

license.description: Link to license document that applies to this dataset version.

name.description: A descriptive name for the model version.

relatedPublications.description: Other publications (e.g. journal article) related to the model version.

releaseDate.description: Date (actual or intended) of first broadcast/publication of this model version.

repository.description: Link to data repository of this model version.

studyTarget.description: The study target for the model version.

summary.description: Short description that summarizes this model (max. 200 words; no references).

versionIdentifier.description: Version identifier of this dataset version.

versionInnovations.description: Short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this dataset version.
